mean_en: to cause (someone) to be more likely to behave in a particular way or to be affected by a particular condition
sentence: Childhood obesity can be ascribed to the genetic predisposition.
sentence_trans: 儿童肥胖症可以被归因于遗传体质。
word_etyma: pre预先 ＋ dis取消 ＋ posit放 ＋ ion表示行为、结果 → 提前做好的准备 → predisposition倾向；素质
